charges.charge_description: 18:924A.F On or about September 11, 2012 in the County of Ector in the Western District of Texas the defendant knowingly providing false information to a Federal Firearm Licensee in violation of Title 18 USC 924(a)(1)(A)

charges.charge_offence_description: 18:924A.F On or about September 11, 2012 in the Co

charges.charge_description: 18:371.F - CONSPIRACY TO DEFRAUD THE UNITED STATES - Defendant conspired with others to export from the US and attempt to export from the US firearms to the Republic of Mexico in violation of Title 18 USC 924(a)(1)(A) and 922(a)(6)(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant sentence to 60 months BOP with such sentence to run concurrently with Counts 4 &; 5, 3 years Supervised Release with such sentence to run concurrently with Counts 4 &; 5, no fine, and $100 Special Assessment

charges.charge_description: 18:922A.F - IMPORTING/MANUFACTURING FIREARMS - Defendant provided false identification in connection with the acquisition of a firearm and executed a Firearms Transaction Record using the false identification in violation of Title 18 USC 922(a)(6)(4)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant sentence to 97 months BOP with such sentence to run concurrently with Counts 1 &; 5, 3 years Supervised Release with such sentence to run concurrently with Counts 1 &; 5, no fine, and $100 Special Assessment

charges.charge_description: 18:1028A.F - FRAUD WITH IDENTIFICATION DOCUMENTS - Defendant unlawfully used the identification of another person during and relation to the violation as set forth in Count 4 of this Indictment in violation of Title 18 USC 1028A(5)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant sentence to 24 months BOP with such sentence to run consecutively with Counts 1 &; 4, 1 year Supervised Release with such sentence to run concurrently with Counts 1 &; 4, no fine, and $100 Special Assessment

charges.charge_description: 18:922A.F - IMPORTING/MANUFACTURING FIREARMS - Defendant provided false information in connection with the acquisition of a firearm and executed a Firearms Transaction Record containing the false information as to the actual buyer of the firearm in violation of Title 18 USC 922(a)(6)(6)

charges.charge_disposition: Count dismissed with prejudice on government's motion

charges.charge_description: 18:1028A.F - FRAUD WITH IDENTIFICATION DOCUMENTS - Defendant unlawfully used the identification of another person during and relation to the violation as set forth in Count 6 of this Indictment in violation of Title 18 USC 1028A(7)

charges.charge_disposition: Count dismissed with prejudice on government's motion

charges.charge_description: 18:922A.F - IMPORTING/MANUFACTURING FIREARMS - Defendant, aided and abetted by others, in the acquisition of a firearm, made false statements on a Firearms Transaction Record as to the actual buyer of the firearm in violation of Title 18 USC 922(a)(6) and 2(8)

charges.charge_disposition: Count dismissed with prejudice on government's motion

charges.charge_description: 18:922A.F - IMPORTING/MANUFACTURING FIREARMS - Defendant provided false information in connection with the acquisition of a firearm and executed a Firearms Transaction Record containing the false information  as to the actual buyer of the firearm in violation of Title 18 USC 922(a)(6)(9-10)

charges.charge_disposition: Count dismissed with prejudice on government's motion

charges.charge_description: 18:922A.F - IMPORTING/MANUFACTURING FIREARMS - Defendant, aided and abetted by others, in the acquisition of a firearm, made false statements on a Firearms Transaction Record as to the actual buyer of the firearm in violation of Title 18 USC 922(a)(6) and 2(8)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant sentenced to 5 years Probation, no fine and $100 Special ASsessment

charges.charge_description: 18:371.F - CONSPIRACY TO DEFRAUD THE UNITED STATES - Defendant conspired with others to export from the US and attempt to export from the US firearms to the Republic of Mexico in violation of Title 18 USC 924(a)(1)(A) and 922(a)(6)(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Count dismissed prejudice on government's motion

charges.charge_description: 18:371.F - CONSPIRACY TO DEFRAUD THE UNITED STATES - Defendant conspired with others to export from the US and attempt to export from the US firearms to the Republic of Mexico in violation of Title 18 USC 924(a)(1)(A) and 922(a)(6)(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant sentenced to 60 months BOP with such sentence to run concurrently with the sentence imposed in Count 2, 3 years Supervised Release with such sentence to run concurrently with the sentence imposed in Count 2, no fine, and $100 Special Assessment

charges.charge_description: 18:924A.F - PENALTIES FOR FIREARMS - Defendant made a false statement on a Firearms Transaction Record as to the actual purchaser of a firearm, and he indicated he resided in El Paso, TX when in truth he resided in Odessa, TX in violation of Title 18 USC 924(a)(1)(A)(2)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant sentenced to 60 months BOP with such sentence to run concurrently with the sentence imposed in Count 1, 3 years Supervised Release with such sentence to run concurrently with the sentence imposed in Count 1, no fine, and $100 Special Assessment

charges.charge_description: 18:924A.F - PENALTIES FOR FIREARMS - Defendant made a false statement on a Firearms Transaction Record as to the actual purchaser of a firearm, and he indicated he resided in El Paso, TX when in truth he resided in Odessa, TX in violation of Title 18 USC 924(a)(1)(A)(3)

charges.charge_disposition: Count dismissed with prejudice on government's motion
